channel.title: Superbowl on Praveen Lobo
channel.description: Recent content in Superbowl on Praveen Lobo

item.title: Green Bay Packer on my Homepage
item.description: Hello world, I dedicated my homepage for Green Bay Packers on 6th February, 2011 and what they got me the same day?! THE SUPER BOWL! It’s hard not to be a packer fan. Packer Fans on Super Bowl day Packer Fans on Super Bowl day Northwestern Mutual Superbowl XLV celebration - Vince Lombardi Ice Trophy Yours truly,

item.title: Northwestern Mutual Supports Green Bay Packers
item.description: Pictures of Northwestern Mutual Insurance company in downtown Milwaukee during NFL 2011 showing support for Green Bay Packers. Northwestern Mutual East Building lit up to support Packers, Milwaukee Northwestern Mutual South Building lit up to support Packers, Milwaukee Photo courtesy: Sushanth Mohan

item.title: Packers, Team Spirit Day
item.description: The whole office was green! Some pictures(scaled down) from the team spirit day mentioned in my previous post. Yours truly Rahul and I Parth and I Rahul and I, again. Pravin, Shailesh, and Bharath Shailesh, Pravin, and Bharath The game at Major Goolsby’s with a couple of my friends - Shailesh, Myself, Balaji, Bharath, Mada, Ramendra (behind the camera).

item.title: The Bears Still Suck!!!
item.description: Green Bay Packers didn’t disappoint in the playoff; they did just what I hoped for in my previous post, First Winter in Milwaukee. They kicked the Bears ass. I watched the game at Major Goolsbyâ€™s with a couple of my friends. Packers played really well in the first and second quarter with a touchdown in each. Then their game was down and they were struggling just like Chicago Bears (but, the bears still suck!
